meanings.sent1: The hazardousness of the situation made everyone nervous.

meanings.sent3: The hazardousness of the banana peel on the floor led to some comical slips.
meanings.sent4: The hazardousness of the storm was like a looming shadow over the town.
meanings.sent5: The hazardousness of the tiger's roar echoed through the jungle.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is dangerous or risky.
meanings.sent1: The hazardousness of the road made driving treacherous.
meanings.sent2: They measured the hazardousness of the activity before allowing it.
meanings.sent3: The hazardousness of the game added an exciting thrill to the competition.
